sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā cāntīng de cài búcuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La nourriture de ce restaurant est bonne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The food at this restaurant is good.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous allons visiter le musée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We're going to visit the museum.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de chéngjī chāoguò le wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses notes ont dépassé les miennes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His grades surpassed mine.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses résultats sont très bons.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His grades are very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng chéngwéi yī míng yīshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux devenir médecin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to become a doctor.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tūrán chūxiàn le yī gè wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Un problème est soudainement apparu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: A problem suddenly appeared.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chūntiān lái le, huā dōu kāi le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le printemps est arrivé, toutes les fleurs ont fleuri.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Spring has come, all the flowers have bloomed.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'utilise le dictionnaire pour chercher les mots nouveaux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I use the dictionary to look up new words.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Faites une phrase avec ce mot.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please make a sentence with this word.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il court très vite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He runs very fast.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他在一家大公司单位工作。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài yī jiā dà gōngsī dānwèi gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il travaille dans une grande entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He works at a large company.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les étudiants travaillent à temps partiel pendant les vacances d'été.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: College students work part-time during summer vacation.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Terre est notre maison.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Earth is our home.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo kùzi tài duǎn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce pantalon est trop court.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These pants are too short.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ tīngdǒng le nǐ shuō de huà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai compris ce que tu as dit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I understood what you said.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je prends le métro pour aller travailler chaque jour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I take the subway to work every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'hiver, il fait très froid à Pékin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Beijing is very cold in winter.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez écouter le dialogue suivant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please listen to the following dialogue.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè duǒ huā duōme piàoliang a!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Comme cette fleur est belle !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: How beautiful this flower is!

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez lire ce paragraphe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please read this paragraph.
